text: The Maggot is the 10th studio album by the Melvins, which was released in 1999 through Ipecac Recordings. This album is the first part of a trilogy followed by The Bootlicker and The Crybaby. The Trilogy was later released on vinyl by Ipecac Recordings (The Trilogy Vinyl, IPC-011, November 27, 2000). On the CD version all songs are split into two tracks. A 2006 reissue of the album swaps the background artwork with The Bootlicker. ==Track listing== All songs written by Buzz Osborne except where noted. ==Personnel== *King Buzzo – vocals, guitar, bass *Dale Crover – drums, guitar, vocals *Kevin Rutmanis – bass, slide bass, screaming ===Additional personnel=== *Tim Green – producer *Mackie Osborne – art ==References== Category:Melvins albums Category:1999 albums Category:Ipecac Recordings albums Category:Sludge metal albums
title: The Maggot
